Welcome to pyersinia documentation!
===================================

What's pyersinia
----------------

Herramienta para ataques de capa de enlace

Author
------

pyersinia was written by Nottingham Prisa Team.

Project site
------------

Sources and URL of project in:

https://github.com/nottinghamprisateam/pyersinia
